title: Urbanization in Tanzania 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of urban population in total population. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Share of urban population in total population has rose over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 33.78 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 26.78 was reached at Year 2008
